member.name: M:ConsumirAPI.Controllers.HolidaysController.get(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Get info of the Holidays of a Country
member.param: Is a Unit ID for to Find a Country
Select the Year for this country

Here you can choose the Type of the Holiday. There is the list: major_holiday - combination of public_holiday, national_holiday, and federal_holiday. public_holiday observance national_holiday federal_holiday(US only) season state_holiday optional_holiday clock_change_daylight_saving_time local_holiday united_nations_observance observance_christian bank_holiday common_local_holiday national_holiday_christian christian observance_hebrew jewish_holiday muslim hindu_holiday restricted_holiday official_holiday national_holiday_orthodox local_observance
